item.description:
If you have been looking for a way to share your business ideas and receive feedback from like-minded colleagues on how to make things happen for your business, please come and meet us and introduce yourself.  This meetup group was created as a forum for small business entrepreneurs to learn from others and to share with others about their small business success as well as failures.  The group provides a venue for shared experiences.

This meetup group is not a networking group nor should it be used as a means to seek business contacts or market your products or services.  There are other means to network by joining Chambers of Commerce or similar business associations designed for doing so.

This group is a self-help group.  Confidentiality of shared information is expected from members of the group in order to allow for open communications.

If you cannot abide by the above for personal or business reasons, please respect these requirements and withdraw your membership from the group.  Otherwise, you will be removed from the group.

We look forward to a new beginning in 2013 and we hope to meet once a month as long as active members find our meetings constructive and helpful to the success of their enterprises.

Thank you for your interest and patience.

Hope to see you soon.

Peter
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the Host/Hostess for the Small Business Forum
item.name: Paving the Way for Small Business Success in 2013
